CHAT.comment: playing with toys in school room with experimenter off to side.
toys on 4 x 5 foot carpet , playdoh; dollhouse with bear figures and furniture; large stuffed bear; construction vehicles , figures and tools; mechano type set
M. Kawash/K. MacDonald for M.A. Evans
Video tape number 6 , 1763 to 2785 , that is 30 min.
20 min. into tape for 9 min , 2499 to 2785, audio H
children are in parallel play with very little verbalization for 1 minute before transcription

u.a: reaches over and moves house herself
pretends to be frightend that something will happen to house
moves over to other side of table
points to metal piece on table .
shows CHI a piece of dough
bends down to look in CHI's playdoh face
taps CHI on shoulder and points to camera
CHI stares in the camera and smiles
holds up finger wrapped in playdoh
